command.text:
select "EmploymentHistory"."ID" "ID" ,"EmploymentHistory"."ContactID" "ContactID" ,"Contact"."FirstNames" "ContactFirstNames" ,"ContactCountry"."Name" "ContactCountryName" ,"ContactCountryOfBirth"."Name" "ContactCountryOfBirthName" ,"ContactMaritalStatus"."Name" "ContactMaritalStatusName" ,"ContactCreatedByUser"."UserName" "ContactCreatedByUserUserName" ,"ContactChangedByUser"."UserName" "ContactChangedByUserUserName" ,"EmploymentHistory"."StartDate" "StartDate" ,"EmploymentHistory"."EndDate" "EndDate" ,"EmploymentHistory"."ProjectID" "ProjectID" ,"Project"."Name" "ProjectName" ,"Project"."Number" "ProjectNumber" ,"ProjectStatus"."Name" "ProjectStatusName" ,"ProjectQuotation"."Number" "ProjectQuotationNumber" ,"ProjectQuotationSubmittedToClientContact"."Name" "ProjectQuotationSubmittedToClientContactName" ,"ProjectQuotationCurrency"."Description" "ProjectQuotationCurrencyDescription" ,"ProjectQuotationEnquiry"."Number" "ProjectQuotationEnquiryNumber" ,"ProjectQuotationStatus"."Name" "ProjectQuotationStatusName" ,"ProjectQuotationChangedByUser"."UserName" "ProjectQuotationChangedByUserUserName" ,"ProjectQuotationCreatedByUser"."UserName" "ProjectQuotationCreatedByUserUserName" ,"ProjectCreatedByUser"."UserName" "ProjectCreatedByUserUserName" ,"ProjectChangedByUser"."UserName" "ProjectChangedByUserUserName" ,"EmploymentHistory"."ClientID" "ClientID" ,"Client"."Name" "ClientName" ,"ClientCountry"."Name" "ClientCountryName" ,"ClientChangedByUser"."UserName" "ClientChangedByUserUserName" ,"EmploymentHistory"."RoleID" "RoleID" ,"Role"."Name" "RoleName" ,"RoleChangedByUser"."UserName" "RoleChangedByUserUserName" ,"EmploymentHistory"."DayRate" "DayRate" ,"EmploymentHistory"."Notes" "Notes" ,"Currency"."ShortCode" "CurrencyShortCode"
,"EmploymentHistory"."CurrencyID" "CurrencyID" ,"EmploymentHistory"."TravelRate" "TravelRate" ,"EmploymentHistory"."TravelCost" "TravelCost"
,"EmploymentHistory"."ChangedByUserID" "ChangedByUserID" ,"ChangedByUser"."UserName" "ChangedByUserUserName" ,"EmploymentHistory"."ChangedOn" "ChangedOn" ,"EmploymentHistory"."Version" "Version" ,"EmploymentHistory"."Contract_days" "Contract_days" from "dbo"."EmploymentHistory" "EmploymentHistory" left join "dbo"."Contacts" "Contact" on "EmploymentHistory"."ContactID" = "Contact"."ID" left join "dbo"."Countries" "ContactCountry" on "Contact"."CountryID" = "ContactCountry"."ID" left join "dbo"."Countries" "ContactCountryOfBirth" on "Contact"."CountryOfBirthID" = "ContactCountryOfBirth"."ID" left join "dbo"."MaritalStatuses" "ContactMaritalStatus" on "Contact"."MaritalStatusID" = "ContactMaritalStatus"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ContactCreatedByUser" on "Contact"."CreatedByUserID" = "ContactCreatedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ContactChangedByUser" on "Contact"."ChangedByUserID" = "ContactChangedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Projects" "Project" on "EmploymentHistory"."ProjectID" = "Project"."ID" left join "dbo"."ProjectStatuses" "ProjectStatus" on "Project"."StatusID" = "ProjectStatus"."ID" left join "dbo"."Quotations" "ProjectQuotation" on "Project"."QuotationID" = "ProjectQuotation"."ID" left join "dbo"."ClientContacts" "ProjectQuotationSubmittedToClientContact" on "ProjectQuotation"."SubmittedToClientContactID" = "ProjectQuotationSubmittedToClientContact"."ID" left join "dbo"."Currency" "ProjectQuotationCurrency" on "ProjectQuotation"."CurrencyID" = "ProjectQuotationCurrency"."ID" left join "dbo"."Currency" "Currency" on "EmploymentHistory"."CurrencyID" = "Currency"."ID"
left join "dbo"."Enquiries" "ProjectQuotationEnquiry" on "ProjectQuotation"."EnquiryID" = "ProjectQuotationEnquiry"."ID" left join "dbo"."QuotationStatuses" "ProjectQuotationStatus" on "ProjectQuotation"."StatusID" = "ProjectQuotationStatus"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ProjectQuotationChangedByUser" on "ProjectQuotation"."ChangedByUserID" = "ProjectQuotationChangedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ProjectQuotationCreatedByUser" on "ProjectQuotation"."CreatedByUserID" = "ProjectQuotationCreatedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ProjectCreatedByUser" on "Project"."CreatedByUserID" = "ProjectCreatedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ProjectChangedByUser" on "Project"."ChangedByUserID" = "ProjectChangedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Clients" "Client" on "EmploymentHistory"."ClientID" = "Client"."ID" left join "dbo"."Countries" "ClientCountry" on "Client"."CountryID" = "ClientCountry"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ClientChangedByUser" on "Client"."ChangedByUserID" = "ClientChangedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Roles" "Role" on "EmploymentHistory"."RoleID" = "Role"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "RoleChangedByUser" on "Role"."ChangedByUserID" = "RoleChangedByUser"."ID" left join "dbo"."Users" "ChangedByUser" on "EmploymentHistory"."ChangedByUserID" = "ChangedByUser"."ID"
